wikipedia_page.main: Emma McDougall (born Emma Burnley; 6 March 1991 – 20 February 2013) was an English female football winger who played for Blackburn Rovers Ladies. Her married name was Emma Mincher, but she used her maiden name in her playing career. She was born in Manchester.

response: *Emma McDougall, 21, English footballer (Blackburn Rovers L.F.C.), cancer.Former Blackburn Rovers Ladies ace loses cancer battle aged 21
